name: Export Table
description: Exports a data table defined on the crosstab area.

properties.name: filename_prefix
properties.description: Custom file name prefix. Workflow, group, data step names and a timestamp willbe added to the name.

properties.name: export_to_project
properties.description: Whether to upload a copy of the generated file to the project folder.

properties.name: export_subfolder_id
properties.description: ID of the export subfolder. If not empty, subfolder name will be ignored.

properties.name: decimal_character
properties.description: How to encode the decimal symbol.

properties.name: data_separator
properties.description: How to encode data separator in CSV files (default is a comma).
